original_text: And as they went about to kill him, tidings came unto the chief captain of the band, that all Jerusalem was in an uproar.
korean_text: 그들이 그를 죽이려 할 때에 온 예루살렘이 요란하다는 소문이 군대의 천부장에게 들리매

sentences.original_text: And as they went about to kill him,
tidings came unto the chief captain of the band,
that all Jerusalem was in an uproar.
